item.description:
Dear Salem MA Meditators  you might enjoy this program:
Shamanic Sound and Healing Circle with Judy and special guest Dave Estes with his didgeridoo
Tuesday, September 6, 7:00-9:00 pm $30.
Pre-register please by calling Judy 781-639-1236

While in circle with kindred souls you will be guided inward to assess what may be in the way of your wholeness and joy.  Now is the time to let go, so your divine Self can be more fully present within you, helping you toward the expression of your highest nature.  In a sacred ritual you will identify your intentions, then enter a shamanic journey to meet your personal guides.  Your guides will offer you gifts and messages to support your evolutionary process.  Journey will be accompanied by the deep resonating tones of the didgeridoo and the pure high tones of crystal singing bowls, as well as rhythmic drumming.  Expect to feel cleared, supported, motivated and held divine light and love.  This is a relective evening, with journal writing and optional sharing.

    Dave Estes studied Toltec Shamanism and Native American traditions as well as vibrational healing methodologies and is a Shamballa Energy practitioner.  Dave utilizes the aboriginal didgeridoo and other instruments and combines them with rhythmic drumming to provide an environment where deep healing states of consciousness are accessed to facilitate healing.
    Judy offers healing through energy and sound and facilitates inner process work to help people reach deep states of awareness and soul recognition. Together Dave and Judy will provide a highly sacred experience meant to fully support the next steps on your life journey.
item.how_to_find_us: Center is above Starbucks. Enter door at the center of the building to the left of H&R Block, go up one flight to 6B.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Shamanic Sound and Healing Circle
